channel.title: Smildon on Chaotic Online
channel.description: Recent content in Smildon on Chaotic Online

item.title: Blight Fight
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet Garv, the OverWorld Caretaker in charge of Lake Morn, helping Tom (and Smildon) to heal the Prexxor Chasm from the Blight instead of fighting it by brute-force

item.title: Chasm Quest
item.description: In this episode Tom finally decides to explore the Prexxor Chasm, in Perim, from the scan he got from CodeMaster Crellan until he realizes that something is really wrong.

item.title: The CodeMaster Chronicles (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode we’ll see the first part of the most amazing match in Chaotic: The battle between Tom Majors and the CodeMaster Crellan!

item.title: Trivias: A Gigantic Mission
item.description: A small video with the Trivia / Quiz originally present in episode A Gigantic Mission
